errors.name: ZeroDepositAmount
errors.msg: Deposit amount cannot be zero.

errors.name: LockInPeriodNotEnded
errors.msg: Lock-in period has not ended yet.

errors.name: LockInPeriodEnded
errors.msg: Lock-in period has already ended. Use normal withdraw.

errors.name: ArithmeticError
errors.msg: An arithmetic operation failed (overflow/underflow/divide by zero).

errors.name: CourseAlreadyStarted
errors.msg: Cannot start a course that has already begun.

errors.name: NoDepositToStartCourse
errors.msg: Cannot start a course without an initial deposit.

errors.name: ZeroLockAmount
errors.msg: Lock amount cannot be zero.

errors.name: InsufficientBalance
errors.msg: Insufficient balance for requested lock amount.

errors.name: NoUnlockedBalance
errors.msg: No unlocked balance available for withdrawal.

errors.name: MarketNotOpenForBets
errors.msg: Market is not open for betting.

errors.name: BettingWindowClosed
errors.msg: Betting window for this market has closed.

errors.name: ZeroBetAmount
errors.msg: Bet amount cannot be zero.

errors.name: CannotBetOnSelf
errors.msg: User cannot bet on their own streak.

errors.name: MarketNotReadyForResolution
errors.msg: Market is not ready for resolution.

errors.name: ResolutionGracePeriodNotOver
errors.msg: Resolution grace period for this market is not over yet.

errors.name: MarketAlreadyResolved
errors.msg: Market has already been resolved.

errors.name: BetBelongsToAnotherUser
errors.msg: This bet belongs to another user.

errors.name: WinningsAlreadyClaimed
errors.msg: Winnings for this bet have already been claimed.

errors.name: PlatformFeeNotClaimed
errors.msg: Platform fee has not been claimed yet; market resolution might be incomplete.

errors.name: UserStateMismatch
errors.msg: The UserState account provided does not match the one associated with the market or user.

errors.name: UserCourseNotStarted
errors.msg: The user being bet on has not started their course yet.

errors.name: BettingWindowTooLong
errors.msg: The betting window duration extends beyond or too close to the task deadline.

errors.name: MarketBelongsToAnotherUser
errors.msg: This market belongs to another user.

errors.name: CourseNotActive
errors.msg: Course is not active. Either it hasn't started or has already ended.
